item.titleType: (Extracted from GPO) Short Titles as Introduced
item.title: Middle Class Health Benefits Tax Repeal Act of 2017
Middle Class Health Benefits Tax Repeal Act of 2017
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the excise tax on high cost employer-sponsored health coverage.
Middle Class Health Benefits Tax Repeal Act of 2017

bill.title: Middle Class Health Benefits Tax Repeal Act of 2017

item.name: Introduced in House
item.text:
Middle Class Health Benefits Tax Repeal Act of 2017

This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal, beginning with taxable years beginning after December 31, 2017, the excise tax on employer-sponsored health care coverage for which there is an excess benefit (high-cost plans).

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.constitutionalAuthorityStatementText: From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]By Mr. KELLY of Pennsylvania:H.R. 173.Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuantto the following:The Congress enacts this bill pursuant to Article I Section8 of the United States Constitution.[Page H51]

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
